title: Dark Choices
description: (13,370 words)A collection of 5 short stories Drop Phone - Taking the wrong call can be a killer. Hard Luck Charlie gets in over his head with the wrong crowd.Christmas Lights - When Christmas comes early, it's hell. Especially when the guests disappear.Pointing the way - Racing with a ghost. What does it take to get a life that's stalled revving again?Roulette - Evil comes calling in Vegas. When fortune swings your way, do you take full advantage? Some discover that some kinds of luck have a price attached.Man & his castle - Searching for the perfect home. When is having it all not enough?
author: Rejean Giguere
